props.name: containerClass
props.description:
Classes that can be added to the inner container, useful if you want to make the footer full width.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: contentLicence
props.description:
The content licence information. Defaults to Open Government Licence (OGL) v3 licence.
If content is provided in the `content-licence` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: copyright
props.description: The copyright information. Defaults to Crown Copyright.

props.name: showCrown
props.description: Whether to show the GOV.UK crown at the top of the footer.

slots.name: navigation
slots.description: A list of `GvFooterNavigation` columns, each containing a list of `GvFooterNavigationItem`s

slots.name: meta
slots.description: One or more `GvFooterMeta` components containing meta items, such as links to your accessibility statement and cookie policy

slots.name: content-licence
slots.description: The content licence information. If content is provided in this slot, the `content-licence` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: copyright
slots.description: The copyright licence information. If content is provided in this slot, the `copyright` prop will be ignored.
